Primary Executive: Linda Digby, Executive Director; Phone: 778.478.0346; Email: ldigby@kelownamuseums.ca
Service Details: - Maintains the legacy of Okanagan Valley residents who served in the Canadian armed forces and in the armed forces of ally nations to give visitors a greater understanding of, and connection to, our proud military heritage- Home to one of the best firearms collections in Canada- Hosts a significant collection of uniforms, insignia, badges, and equipment, including artefacts from the Boer War, World War I and World War II, the Korean War, the Cold War, and contemporary military operations- Home to the Vince Bezeau Military Archives- Library is open to researchers- Offers specialized group programs and events, such as the Remembrance Day open house and the Canada Day book sale
Address & Map: Kelowna Memorial Arena1424 Ellis StKelowna, BC     V1Y 2A5View MapQuest Map
